original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 11.2. Kusalattika, Vipākattika
analyzed: kusala attika vipāka attika

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko ca naabyākato navipāko ca dhammā
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāko ca na abyākataḥ na vipāko ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko ca
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāko ca

original: naakusalo navipāko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ na vipāko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na akusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naabyākataṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na abyākatam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākañca naabyākataṁ navipākañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākañca na abyākatam na vipākañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naakusalaṁ navipākañca naabyākataṁ navipākañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na akusalam na vipākañca na abyākatam na vipākañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākañca naakusalaṁ navipākañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākañca na akusalam na vipākañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa sabbattha vitthāro

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ

original: ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na akusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na akusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ

original: ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammañca na akusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammañca dhammam paṭicca

original: nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammañca

original: naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
analyzed: na akusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammañca na akusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo ca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava sabbattha nava

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
